channel.title: Twa on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Twa on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Are You Not Entertained?
item.description: Today in Tedium: There was a time when in-flight entertainment was better than anything you could actually bring onto a plane. That time has long passed, and some airlines are looking to get rid of seat-back screens, in favor of letting you use whatever screen you have with you—while making the WiFi better so you’d actually want to do that. Odds are that not many people are going to miss those screens.
